DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate multiple same-day CoolSculpting treatment increase risk abnormal lipid liver-related test .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Male female subject > 18 year age . Subject assess receive multiple CoolSculpting treatment abdomen flank , define follow : 1 . Lower Abdomen One 60 minute cycle CoolMax , 2 . Right Left Flank One 60 minute cycle per flank , CoolCurve+ CoolCore , simultaneously . Subject weight change exceed 10 pound precede month . Subject body mass index ( BMI ) 30 . BMI define weight pound multiply 703 divide square height inch . Subject agree make major change diet lifestyle course study . Subject read sign write informed consent form . Exclusion Criteria Subject invasive ( e.g. , liposuction , mesotherapy , abdominoplasty ) noninvasive fat reduction and/or body contour procedure area intend treatment within past 6 month . Subject need administer , know history subcutaneous injection area intend treatment ( e.g. , heparin , insulin ) within past month . Subject known history cryoglobulinemia , cold urticaria , paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria . Subject history hernia area ( ) treat . Subject pregnant intending become pregnant study period ( next 4 month ) . Subject lactate lactate past 3 month . Subject unable unwilling comply study requirement , blood draw . Subject currently enrol clinical study unapproved investigational drug device . Subject history lipodosis confound metabolic disease . Subject take take medication within past 3 month may affect metabolic function . Patient history diabetes . Any condition laboratory value would , professional opinion investigator , potentially affect subject 's response integrity data would pose unacceptable risk subject .
